Author:
mstrong, slabrams, smorrissey

getSource

public static Source getSource(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                               InputStream stream,
                               String name,
                               Reportable otherProperties)
                        throws IOException,
                               JHOVE2Exception
Get a source unit from an InputStream. Used for example to create a Source unit from a Zip file entry. Cteates backing temporary file

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
stream - InputStream containing content of source
name - file name Source would have in its container
otherProperties - non-file-system reportable properties associated with Source
Returns:
Source unit
Throws:
IOException
JHOVE2Exception

getSource

public static Source getSource(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                               SourceFactory sourceFactory,
                               String name,
                               String... names)
                        throws IOException,
                               JHOVE2Exception
Make Source from list of formatted objects, which may be files, directories. and URLS

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
sourceFactory - SourceFactory which configures accessors for this source
name - First object name, which may be a file, directory, or URL
names - Additional object names, which may be files, directories, or URLs
Returns:
Source
Throws:
IOException
JHOVE2Exception
